statements: SELECT * FROM quality_control_measures;
SELECT employee_id, measure_name, evaluation_date FROM quality_control_measures WHERE passed = TRUE;
SELECT measure_name, measure_description FROM quality_control_measures WHERE evaluation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, measure_name, passed FROM quality_control_measures WHERE employee_id = 'e6f68e7c-55d1-4832-9673-eb6f93e3f76a';
SELECT * FROM quality_control_measures WHERE measure_name ILIKE '%regulation%' AND passed = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_measures WHERE passed = true ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC
SELECT measure_name, measure_description FROM quality_control_measures WHERE employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT id, measure_name, evaluation_date FROM quality_control_measures WHERE passed = false
SELECT * FROM quality_control_measures WHERE employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND passed = false
SELECT id, measure_name, implied_regulations FROM quality_control_measures ORDER BY measure_name ASC
SELECT * FROM quality_control_measures;
SELECT measure_name, compliance_level FROM quality_control_measures WHERE compliance_level > 80;
SELECT id, measure_name FROM quality_control_measures ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM monitoring_events WHERE monitoring_status = 'active';
SELECT event_id, event_timestamp FROM monitoring_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_measures WHERE compliance_level > 80 ORDER BY measure_name DESC
SELECT measure_name, compliance_level FROM quality_control_measures WHERE compliance_level < 50
SELECT * FROM monitoring_events WHERE event_timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND monitoring_status = 'active'
SELECT measure_name, compliance_level FROM quality_control_measures WHERE compliance_level BETWEEN 50 AND 70 ORDER BY measure_name
SELECT * FROM monitoring_events ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM compliance_standards
SELECT standard_name, description FROM compliance_standards WHERE regulation_id = 1
SELECT id, timestamp, action_taken FROM monitoring_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT product_id, date FROM quality_control_monitoring WHERE id = 15
SELECT * FROM quality_control_monitoring WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM quality_control_monitoring WHERE product_id = 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT issue_description, date FROM quality_control_monitoring WHERE id = 10 AND product_id = 200;
SELECT standard_name, regulation_id FROM compliance_standards WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY standard_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM monitoring_logs WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, action_taken FROM monitoring_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND timestamp <= '2021-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM quality_control_measures;
SELECT measure_name, compliance_status FROM quality_control_measures;
SELECT standard_name, description FROM standards;
SELECT monitoring_id, monitoring_date, result FROM monitoring_data ORDER BY monitoring_date DESC;
SELECT log_id, monitoring_id, action_taken, log_date FROM compliance_logs WHERE log_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM quality_control_measures WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT measure_name, compliance_status FROM quality_control_measures WHERE id = 1;
SELECT standard_name, description FROM standards ORDER BY standard_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM monitoring_data WHERE result LIKE '%pass%';
SELECT * FROM compliance_logs WHERE log_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT control_measure_name, description FROM QualityControlMeasures
SELECT system_name, monitoring_frequency FROM MonitoringSystems
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM Regulations
SELECT officer_name, officer_email FROM ComplianceOfficers
SELECT log_timestamp, log_description FROM AuditLogs
SELECT * FROM QualityControlMeasures;
SELECT control_measure_name, compliance_status FROM QualityControlMeasures WHERE compliance_status='Compliant';
SELECT system_name, monitoring_frequency FROM MonitoringSystems ORDER BY monitoring_frequency DESC;
SELECT officer_name, officer_email, officer_phone FROM ComplianceOfficers WHERE officer_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, performed_by FROM AuditLogs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
